DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine effect consumption novel food supplement consist Canola Oil , Fibre DHA , contain effective food bioactives , include n-3 fatty acid enrich dietary oil high monounsaturated fatty acid ( MUFAs ) soluble dietary fibre , aim management heart disease risk factor people metabolic syndrome test efficacy safety human .
DOC.brief_title: Canola Oil , Fibre DHA Enhanced Clinical Trial
DOC.detailed_description: The propose study randomize , single-blind , crossover trial , conduct Richardson Centre Functional Food Nutraceuticals ( RCFFN ) , University Manitoba . The study design consist 4 phase 30 day per phase , phase separate 4-week washout period . Participants consume recommend weight-maintaining diet ( 35 % energy fat , 50 % carbohydrate , 15 % protein ) supplement follow novel Muffin cooky : ( ) control food contain butter , sunflower safflower oil comprise largely saturated fat substantial level n-6 linoleic acid , refine wheat flour common current North American intake , ( b ) food contain high oleic canola oil docosahexaenoic acid ( HOCO-DHA ) refine wheat flour , ( c ) food contain high molecular weight barley B-glucan combination sunflower , safflower oil butter , ( ) food contain combination HOCO-DHA high molecular weight barley β-glucan . Treatments isocalorically incorporate muffin cooky consume equal part breakfast supper .
DOC.criteria: BMI≥25 Kg/m2 Waist circumference ≥94 cm ( male ) ≥80 cm ( female ) Meet least two follow : Triglycerides ≥1.7 mmol/L High density lipoprotein ( HDL ) cholesterol < 1 mmol/L ( male ) < 1.3 mmol/L ( female ) Low density lipoprotein ( LDL ) cholesterol ≥2.7 mmol/L Fasting glucose ≥5.6 mmol/L Consuming lipid lower medication Consuming nutritional supplement Disease disorder could interfere absorption Smokers Hypertension ≥150 mmHg ( systolic ) and/or ≥100 mmHg ( diastolic ) Planning become pregnant Consume > 1 alcoholic drink/day Medication within month prior screen
